name: Space-less Odyssey
description:
In Space-less Odyssey we participate in the adventures of a young woman who wakes up on a distant island and wants to return home, along with her girlfriend. However, problems seem to haunt her, so she must find ways to get out of them again and again.

Space-less Odyssey is played with a controller, with simple and easy controls that don't require a lot of gaming experience.       

We, Zia Babs, are a group of developers and artists who have come together to create games. We want to tell stories that our players are passionate about, and for that, stories must first fascinate us.

The 2021 Epic MegaJam is a great opportunity to make ourselves known, and if possible, give a great boost to our beginning in the world of indie development.

Purpose of the game: Collect all the necessary objects (shown in the lower left corner of the screen) to escape each stage.

Note: The collision box for lava in the first map, and for water in general, is larger than the object itself.  Be careful when passing too close.
